item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Putin ally pushes deal to restart Nord Stream 2 with US backing
2. Crypto prices jump as Trump names tokens included in strategic reserve
3. UK and France aim for new Ukraine peace deal after White House fracas
4. Starmer to warn Zelenskyy peace with Russia means mending ties with Trump
5. [Opinion]Â The US Congress is missing in action
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
